page.title: 04Littlebrook Powerstation
page.content: The station cost Â£600 million to build requires minimal staff to run,consisting of engineers,craftsmen operators and administrative staff. Control The turbo_generater units are controlled from the central control room where a unit control desk and unit control panel are located for each of the three units.A station services control panel. Each turbo_generater has its own computer,arranged to drive visual dispay unit(V.D.U)mounted in the unit control desk.Another V.D.U is fitted in the supervisers desk to provide extension displays.A spare computer,with perminantly installed cables,is just in case the big one goes wrong.Ready for use.They have two printers and 5 V.D.U.s.
